name: whatsapp-ai-doctor-bot-v3
description: Production-ready Node.js backend spec. Hybrid architecture: Intent Router (local), Context Engine (Redis), Query Orchestrator (DB), Vector Memory Hub (semantic recall), Gemini LLM for natural replies only when needed, event-driven Reminder Worker and Summarizer Worker. WhatsApp Web.js primary with Business API fallback. Focus on safety: no medical advice, encrypted PII, rate limits, and async background processing.
author: Your Name
